title: Functional Network Outliers
text: R package detecting functional outliers network setting.

title: Functional Network Outliers
text: Install using:

title: Functional Depth Outliers — func_depth_outlier
text: function negates function returns true item notin item .

title: Functional Depth Outliers — func_depth_outlier
code: func_depth_outlier(   data,   times,   threshold = "beta",   perc = 0.01,   B = 10,   maxiter = 10 )

title: Functional Depth Outliers — func_depth_outlier
text: data matrix row observation time series. Row names unique ID. times vector length equal number columns data specifying time points recorded . threshold choice threshold calculation. One c("beta", "bootstrap"). Default "beta". perc percentile distribution use. Default 0.01. B number bootstraps use. 0, distribution fitted empirical depths. Default 10. maxiter Maximum number iterations outlier detection. Default 10.

title: Functional Depth Outliers — func_depth_outlier
text: boolean vector.

title: Functional Depth Threshold — func_depth_threshold
text: function calculates threshold functional depths order classify outliers using bootstrap approach.

title: Functional Depth Threshold — func_depth_threshold
text: data matrix row observation time series. times vector length equal number columns data specifying time points recorded . perc percentile distribution use. Default 0.01. B number bootstraps use. 0, distribution fitted empirical depths. Default 1000.

title: Functional Depth Threshold — func_depth_threshold
text: numeric giving threshold.

title: Functional Depth Threshold Beta — func_depth_threshold_beta
text: function calculates threshold functional depths order classify outliers bootstrapping fitting beta distribution. approach faster func_depth_threshold() makes Beta distribution assumption functional depths may always appropriate.

title: Functional Depth Threshold Beta — func_depth_threshold_beta
text: data matrix row observation time series. times vector length equal number columns data specifying time points recorded . perc percentile distribution use. Default 0.01. B number bootstraps use. 0, distribution fitted empirical depths. Default 10.

title: Functional Depth Threshold Beta — func_depth_threshold_beta
text: numeric giving threshold.

title: Functional extrapolation — func_extrapolation
text: function extrapolates partially observed data using historic arima processes.

title: Functional extrapolation — func_extrapolation
text: data matrix row observation time series. Row names unique datetime. alpha weighting function weight historic arima forecasts

title: Functional extrapolation — func_extrapolation
text: boolean vector.

title: Historic forecast — historic_forecast
text: function computes historic forecast using linear regression, days week variables.

title: Historic forecast — historic_forecast
text: d_obs matrix row observation time series. Row names unique datetime.

title: Historic forecast — historic_forecast
text: numeric matrix
